parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the triangle where the index begins at 0

title: ISFSymbol.GetTriangleAtIndex
description: Gets the triangle at the specified index.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the triangle where the index begins at 0

remarks:
Call
ISFSymbol::GetTriangleCount
before calling this method to get the number of triangles in this surface finish symbol.
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
vertexPt1
[3],
vertexPt2
[3],
vertexPt3
[3],
isFilled
,
lineType
]
where:
vertexPt1
[3]
= First XYZ vertex point
vertexPt2
[3]
= Second XYZ vertex point
vertexPt3
[3]
= Third XYZ vertex point
isFilled
= BOOLEAN returned as a double; True if triangle is filled, false if not
lineType
= Line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
.
